meanings.definition: A chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed fluorouracil to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: She underwent treatment with fluorouracil to combat the disease.
meanings.sent3: The cancer cells were no match for the powerful fluorouracil.
meanings.sent4: Like a warrior, fluorouracil battled the cancer within her body.
meanings.sent5: The fluorouracil worked tirelessly to destroy the harmful cells.

meanings.definition: A medication applied topically to treat certain skin conditions.
meanings.sent1: After applying fluorouracil, her skin condition improved significantly.
meanings.sent2: The dermatologist recommended using fluorouracil for the skin issue.
meanings.sent3: She joked that fluorouracil was her secret weapon against the pesky rash.
meanings.sent4: The fluorouracil acted like a superhero, saving her skin from distress.
meanings.sent5: The effects of fluorouracil on her skin were truly remarkable.
